O

onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.controller.MainActivity
Sets up a connection to an instance of MainViewModel, in order to observe and modify the execution state of the simulation, and to enable LiveData data binding between MainViewModel and the views in the layout (in particular, TerrainView).
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.controller.MainActivity
Inflates the options menu containing simulation execution controls.
onDraw(Canvas) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.view.TerrainView
Renders the contents of the Arena's terrain.
onLayout(boolean, int, int, int, int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.view.TerrainView
Performs layout on all child elements (none), and creates a Bitmap to fit the specified dimensions.
onMeasure(int, int) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.view.TerrainView
Returns dimensions based on the larger of this view's suggested height and width, so that the content is square.
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.controller.MainActivity
Handles user selection of an options menu item by invoking MainViewModel methods to start (resume), stop, or reset the Arena simulation.
onPrepareOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class edu.cnm.deepdive.rps.controller.MainActivity
Updates the options menu, based on the current execution state of the Arena simulation, as reflected in MainViewModel.isRunning().
